overview: Wholesome Adrianna must choose between love and destiny. Faced with continuing to train her lover and top-ranked fighter, or to delve into the seedy world of underground female smoker fights, she must make a choice that will affect her life forever. Will she choose love or her life? Laced with graphic, hard-hitting sex, and neck-snapping MMA action, find out what fate holds in store for Adrianna.
title: Tuff Love
